A Recap of the ConventionTimes political reporters discuss what happened and what’s ahead

Mnuchin Paved Way for Postal Service Shake-UpThe Postal Service was walled off from political influence in 1970. Then Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin got involved at President Trump’s behest.Now the Trump administration is facing allegations it sought to politicize the agency and hinder its ability to handle a surge in mail-in ballots.

BREAKING NEWSHouse Votes to Block Postal Changes and Allocate Funds for MailThe Democratic bill would send $25 billion to the Postal Service and temporarily reverse changes that have slowed service as the election approaches.
George H.W. Bush won the presidency in 1988 by a margin of 53 percent to 46 percent. Mike Sprague/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images

2 Blazes Are Among California’s Largest EverSpreading wildfires have torched nearly one million acres in the state, an area larger than Rhode Island. Follow updates here.

Global Death Toll Surpasses 800,000New infections flared in Europe and high numbers of deaths were recorded across the United States, India, South Africa and most of Latin America.Health officials are linking virus cases to the 10-day Sturgis motorcycle rally, which drew hundreds of thousands of participants.
